name: Jörmungandr
deal: Destroys 1 random structure of a chosen player: sacrifices 1 structure of your own

name: Freyr
deal: Grows 1 Tree on a River Tile: costs all available Energy (min 1 Energy)
blessing: Grows Trees on all River Tiles
curse: Overgrows 1 random Statue so it cannot be used anymore and blocks the tile

name: Dwarf
deal: Smeltery: produces +1 Artifact next Round: 1 random Structure does not produce Runes next round
blessing: Next Artifact from Smeltery debuffs all Players

name: Freyja
deal: Finds 1 random Artifact: costs (a lot of) Runes
curse: Conquers a Tile in possession and makes it unusable

name: Hel
deal: Blocks the Statue of a chosen Player next Round: blocks a random Structure of your own next Round
blessing: Destroys the statue of a random Player
curse: Goes back to Helheim and the Statue gets destroyed

name: Nidhöggr
deal: Devours a random Tree on the Board: needs to be fed 2 Artifacts
blessing: Devours all Trees on the Board

name: Loki
deal: Sets 1 Trap for a chosen Player: steals 1 Artefact in return
blessing: Steals a set amount of Runes from a random Player and gives them to you

name: Surtr
deal: Destroys 1 random Structure or Statue of a chosen Player: consumes the Flaming Sword Structure (needs to have Flaming Sword Tile in possession)
blessing: Gifts 2 Tiles of Muspelheim for free
curse: Destroys 1 random Structure or Statue of your own
